mods.abstract: Five jelly-fish-like configurations each having a hand and lower arm covering its face range from the foreground to the background of this print. A sense of motion is conveyed in the print by the cilia-like configurations decorating each head and trailing off the rear in a jelly-fish-like manner. In addition, the brushed-gray background enhances the feeling of motion.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art
